channel.title: Help with staff list

item.title: Help with staff list
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

I think this would be server-sided along with the text. Maybe the login method where it says the player is online in the friends list can be put into this.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with staff list
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

I need help im not that good at java coding i would like to know how would i make it so if person on staff list is online is says online on the right side of name or if there offline it says offline just like for friends list (please help)

Code in rsinterface for this tab

[code]public static void ChaosxTab(RSFont[] tda) {
RSInterface tab = addTabInterface(15051);
addText(15053, “Staff list”, tda, 2, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addSprite(15054, 0, “Interfaces/Achieve/ACH”);
addSprite(15055, 1, “Interfaces/Achieve/ACH”);
addSprite(15056, 0, “Interfaces/Achieve/ACH”);
tab.totalChildren(4);
tab.child(0, 15053, 57, 5);
tab.child(1, 15055, 0, 25);
tab.child(2, 15056, 0, 249);
tab.child(3, 15054, 0, 25);

addText(15067, "Staff list", tda, 2, 0xff9b00, false,true);
	addSprite(15058, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
	addSprite(15060, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
addHoverButton(15063, "Interfaces/Achieve/ACH", 2, 160, 32, "Call for help", -1, 15077, 1);
 addHoveredButton(15077, "Interfaces/Achieve/ACH", 4, 160, 32, 15078);
addText(15059, "Owner/Coder's", tda, 2, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15065, "Administrator's", tda, 2, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15064, "@gre@Open", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15068, "@whi@Austin", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15061, "@whi@Justin", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15070, "Moderator's", tda, 2, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15076, "@whi@Clayton", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addSprite(15062, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
addSprite(15066, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
addSprite(15069, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
addSprite(15071, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
addSprite(15075, 0, "Interfaces/Options/LINE");
addText(15072, "@whi@Newbie", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15073, "@whi@Rockstar", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
addText(15074, "@whi@Waffles", tda, 1, 0xff9b00, false, true);
    tab.totalChildren(20);
tab.child(0, 15058, 0, 22);
tab.child(1, 15063, 15, 211);
tab.child(2, 15059, 49, 25);
tab.child(3, 15060, 0, 41);
tab.child(4, 15061, 1, 45);
tab.child(5, 15062, 0, 76);
tab.child(6, 15065, 45, 79);
tab.child(7, 15064, 1, 97);
tab.child(8, 15066, 0, 94);
tab.child(9, 15067, 60, 4);
tab.child(10, 15068, 1, 110);
tab.child(11, 15069, 0, 126);
tab.child(12, 15070, 50, 129);
tab.child(13, 15071, 0, 144);
tab.child(14, 15072, 1, 147);
tab.child(15, 15073, 1, 161);
tab.child(16, 15074, 1, 175);
tab.child(17, 15075, 0, 191);
tab.child(18, 15076, 1, 59);
tab.child(19, 15077, 15, 211);
   }	[/code]
